author: Staff Reporter
text:
City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan has issued regulatory order under Section 41 of the Tamil Nadu City Police Act, 1997 (extended to the cities of Salem, Tiruchi and Tirunelveli) for a period of 15 days commencing from midnight of February 27 to midnight of March 12. The order prohibits assemblies, meetings, processions, agitations, demonstrations etc., without prior permission.

Missing boy traced

A class VII boy who went missing from a home for children in M. Kalipatti in Mecheri police limits on Thursday was traced and rescued within eight hours. The boy was studying in a government school. The home administrator Rajendran lodged a complaint with the police and a boy missing case was filed.

A team led by Sub Inspector Jeyarani of Anti Human Trafficking Wing traced and rescued the boy.
title: Regulatory order
